message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. To make it worth my while, I could come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd like to make a more serious offer. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. This is my final offer.
